name: @react-debugger/core
description: React debugger for humans and AI agents - inspect components, set breakpoints, and understand React internals programmatically

scripts.build: bun build src/cli.ts --outdir dist --target node       && bun build src/mcp-server.ts --outdir dist --target bun       && bun build src/react-bridge-client.ts --outdir dist --outfile dist/react-bridge-client.js --target browser       && mkdir -p dist/templates && cp src/templates/mcp.json dist/templates/mcp.json
scripts.local: bun run build && npm pack && sudo npm i -g ./$(npm pack | tail -1) && bunx serve dist --cors -p 8080
